text: The Dayton Flight are an American professional basketball team based out of Dayton, Ohio, and a member of The Basketball League (TBL). ==History== On August 26, 2019, Evelyn Magley, CEO of The Basketball League (TBL), announced a new franchise called the Dayton Flight with Brandon Harper as general manager. The Flight follow previous minor league basketball teams in Dayton, including the Dayton Wings, Dayton Jets, and Dayton Air Strikers. == References == ==External links== Category:The Basketball League teams Category:Basketball teams in Ohio Category:Basketball teams established in 2019 Category:Sports teams in Dayton, Ohio Category:2019 establishments in Ohio
title: Dayton Flight
